pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Comprehensive Toolkit for Working with Encrypted Parquet Files // Utilities for reading, writing, and managing RCDF files, including encryption and decryption support. It offers a flexible interface for handling data stored in encrypted Parquet format, along with metadata extraction, key management, and secure operations using Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) and Rivest-Shamir-Adleman (RSA) encryption.
